ygData.subject: Question about some of the new zones
ygData.msgSnippet: I have all of the expansions, except for PoR, but I ve found the newer zones to be just flat out TOUGH.  I don t group much (thanks to many bad experiences of
ygData.messageBody:
I have all of the expansions, except for PoR, but I've found the newer
zones to be just flat out TOUGH. I don't group much (thanks to many
bad experiences of late) and I've found that new world zones are just
too difficult for my 63 Beastlord to handle, even with a suped up pet.
I can barely handle Coranthas Creep with CV, KEI (C3), and Wunshi,
and the pet with CV and Wunshi. I know a BL wasn't designed to be a
tank, but even with sharing tanking duties with the pet, I kill one
mob and have to med and heal for 10 minutes to fight another mob. I
do better going to Veksar and fighting there in the basement, but that
kind of defeats the purpose of buying the newest expansion. If all I
can do is hunt in old world zones, why buy the expansion? Or am I
just doing something wrong?
